vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to the engineering services contract with Dal-Tech Engineering Inc. to provide additional civil engineering, surveying, and geotechnical engineering services to complete the design of Community Drive from Denton Drive to Northwest Highway - Not to exceed $135,523.00, from $278,078.13 to $413,601.13 - Financing:  Specified Street Project Fund (2003 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($114,412.00), Water Capital Improvement (F) Fund ($11,611.00), and Wastewater Capital Improvement (G) Fund ($9,500.00)
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to the engineering services contract with Dal-Tech Engineering Inc. to provide additional civil engineering, surveying, and geotechnical engineering services to complete the design of Community Drive from Denton Drive to Northwest Highway - Not to exceed $135,523.00, from $278,078.13 to $413,601.13 - Financing:  Specified Street Project Fund (2003 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($114,412.00), Water Capital Improvement (F) Fund ($11,611.00), and Wastewater Capital Improvement (G) Fund ($9,500.00)
